result.arabic_text: وَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمَ خَلَقَهَاۖ لَكُمۡ فِيهَا دِفۡءٞ وَمَنَٰفِعُ وَمِنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ
result.translation: 5. Xoolahana wuu idiin abuuray; waxaad ka heshaan dhar dugaal leh iyo manaafacaad kale3, xaggeedana wax ka cuntaan.
result.footnotes: 3. Dhar ahaan loo xidho, teendhooyin, alaabooyin, iwm.
